title: The Passion of Spain
creator_credit: Grainger Maynard, Maynard and Greg Grainger
brief_description: As seen on ATN 7 on “The world around us”, this is a tour through Spain, looking at the diverse mix of ancient Spanish traditions and the new vibrancy which has swept through the country. Witness spectacular fairs and parades, as well as looking at the remote areas of the country, such as Galica, the Basque homelands and Gomera in the Canary Islands.
